name: SPARTA
description: SPARTA is a hyper-deflationary token on PulseChain designed to reduce supply and increase value over time. It applies a 5% tax on every buy and sell; fees from these transactions are used to strengthen liquidity and burn tokens permanently. SPARTA is primarily paired with HEX, allowing it to benefit from HEX’s price performance through Heart’s Law. A supporting network of trading pairs drives volume, reinforcing liquidity and price stability.
